name: Fancy Skulls
description: Fancy Skulls is a challenging first person shooter with procedural generation, permadeath and distinct art style. Intense and tactical combat, unique weapon mods and items that change the way you play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
